enWisdom: A dispraised character is from the fruits of ignorance

Wisdom: سُوءُ الْخُلُقِ شُؤْمٌ وَالْإِسَاءَةُ إِلَى الْمُحْسِنِ لُؤْمٌ
enWisdom: Bad character is inauspicious and offending a benefactor is wickedness
Bad character is the worst companion

Wisdom: كُلُّ دَاءٍ يُدَاوَى إِلَّا سُوءَ الْخُلُقِ
enWisdom: Every malady has a cure except bad character

Wisdom: وَاللَّهِ لَا يُعَذِّبُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ مُؤْمِناً بَعْدَ الْإِيمَانِ إِلَّا بِسُوءِ ظَنِّهِ وَسُوءِ خُلُقِهِ
enWisdom: By Allah! Allah, the Glorified, will not punish a believer after he believes except because of his thinking ill [of others] and his bad character
There is no quality more disgraceful than ineptitude
